## cdpctl upgrade

upgrade service

### Synopsis

upgrade service'

```
cdpctl upgrade [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -g, --group string     upgrade all services under given group-name.
  -h, --help             help for upgrade
  -r, --release string   release-name involved in upgrade task.
```
